title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 802/80 of 27 March 1980 on the classification of goods falling within subheading 04.03 A of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 802/80  of 27 March 1980  on the classification of goods falling within subheading 04.03 A of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Products having the physical structure, the typical taste and the qualitative chemical composition of butter but containing only from 75 to 80 % of milkfats, shall be classified in the Common Customs Tariff under subheading:
04.03 Butter:
A. Of a fat content, by weight not exceeding 85 %.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 March 1980.
For the Commission
